blogPost.excerpt: Pika (pronounced pi·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
blogPost.body: Pika (pronounced pi·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
blogPost.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Pika（发音为pi-kuh，像picker）是一款简单易用、开源的macOS原生色彩采集器。Pika让你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的颜色变得很简单，所以你可以继续成为一个快速、成功的设计师。
localize.tagline: 一款适用于macOS的开源颜色挑选器应用。

localize.description: Pika（發音爲pi-kuh，像picker）是一款簡單易用、開源的macOS原生色彩採集器。Pika讓你在屏幕上快速找到你所需要的格式的顏色變得很簡單，所以你可以繼續成爲一個快速、成功的設計師。
localize.tagline: 一款適用於macOS的開源顏色挑選器應用。

previous.excerpt: Appy Pie Chatbot Builder is a cloud based software that lets you create custom answer bots without any coding and add it to your website in minutes. Start with easy templates and customize your answer bot with an intuitive drag-n-drop interface. Get Started.
previous.title: Appy Pie Chatbot - Create intelligent answer bots without any coding

localize.description: Appy Pie Chatbot Builder是一款基于云计算的软件，让您无需任何编码即可创建自定义的回答机器人，并在几分钟内将其添加到您的网站。从简单的模板开始，并通过直观的拖放界面自定义您的回答机器人。开始使用。
localize.tagline: 无需任何编码即可创建智能答题机器人

localize.description: Appy Pie Chatbot Builder是一款基於雲計算的軟件，讓您無需任何編碼即可創建自定義的回答機器人，並在幾分鐘內將其添加到您的網站。從簡單的模板開始，並通過直觀的拖放界面自定義您的回答機器人。開始使用。
localize.tagline: 無需任何編碼即可創建智能答題機器人

next.excerpt: AirConsole Meet lets you instantly play games with your team in Zoom, Google Meet or any other video conferencing service. The games allow colleagues to bond together while working from home. Perfect for team building during the pandemic.
next.title: AirConsole Meet - Play games in video calls with your team

localize.description: AirConsole Meet让您可以在Zoom、Google Meet或任何其他视频会议服务中与您的团队即时玩游戏。这些游戏可以让同事们在家中工作的同时团结在一起。非常适合在流行病期间进行团队建设。
localize.tagline: 与你的团队在视频通话中玩游戏

localize.description: AirConsole Meet讓您可以在Zoom、Google Meet或任何其他視頻會議服務中與您的團隊即時玩遊戲。這些遊戲可以讓同事們在家中工作的同時團結在一起。非常適合在流行病期間進行團隊建設。
localize.tagline: 與你的團隊在視頻通話中玩遊戲
